scripts.purecss: rm -f v2.0.1.zip && rm -rf pure-2.0.1 && wget https://github.com/pure-css/pure/archive/v2.0.1.zip && unzip v2.0.1.zip && cd pure-2.0.1 && yarn install && npx grunt && tail -n +7 ./build/grids-min.css > ./build/grid-min.css
scripts.build: mkdir -p ./src/public/dist && npx browserify ./src/public/scripts/main.ts -p [ tsify ] > ./src/public/dist/bundle.js && npx minify ./src/public/dist/bundle.js > ./src/public/dist/bundle.min.js && npx minify ./src/public/*.css ./pure-2.0.1/build/grids-min.css > ./src/public/dist/min.css
